title: Factors that affect reaction rate include

content.description: Factors that affect the rate of a chemical reaction include which of the following?
content.question: I. Frequency of collisions of reactant particles II. Kinetic energy of collisions of reactant particlesIII. Orientation of reactant particles during collisions

skill.text: 6.E: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using connections between particulate and macroscopic scales or levels.
